summary: Diff adds an adjustable AI Speed setting (Fast/Normal/Smooth) that controls AI move delay and a conditional thinking indicator threshold, updates AI turn sequencing in App to remove the fixed 500ms delay, and optimizes the MiniMax implementation with alpha-beta pruning and memoization for faster unbeatable play.

hallucinated_features.description: Persisting the selected AI speed step to localStorage (including a storage key and defaulting to 'fast').
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7/8/9 require an adjustable, user-visible speed control but do not request persistence across sessions or a specific default behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Use of decorative icons (Zap/Clock/Sparkles) in the AI speed selector UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 requires a user-visible control with speed steps, but does not request iconography.
